plot: Edgar's father-in-law is heir to the worthless family estate in the south. Naturally, Edgar jumps at the chance to take possession and become Col. Kennedy.
title: Mad About Moonshine
plot_es: Edgar's father-in-law is heir to the worthless family estate in the south. Naturally, Edgar jumps at the chance to take possession and become Col. Kennedy.
plot_en: Edgar's father-in-law is heir to the worthless family estate in the south. Naturally, Edgar jumps at the chance to take possession and become Col. Kennedy.
